external_games.name: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App

name: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
storyline:
He carries a petty pride, believing he could date anyone if he put his mind to it. However, when he confidently logs onto the dating app, he’s confronted with the brutal hierarchy of the dating world. Placed in the lowest tier—Bronze—his self-esteem takes a major hit.

Unable to accept his Bronze tier, Tesu resolves to prove his dating prowess by ultimately reaching the coveted Gold tier and, in the process, finding true love.
summary:
FMV (Interactive Movie)

"It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"
Meet Tesu Kang, a simp who's never had a girlfriend in his 30 years. Now facing the harsh reality of aging without any prospects for romance. he realizes that if there's no path, he must forge his own. Determined to find new love through a dating app, Tesu embarks on what could be the biggest challenge of his life.

Join in and see how your choices will change his destiny!
